hero.headline: The ultimate protocol for factory security
hero.subheadline: BELT helps you create intuitive, custom dashboards to visualize your most important safety metrics — in real time, across every department.

features.headline: Built for the factory floor
features.subheadline: Every feature is designed to keep your team safe and your operations running smoothly.

items.title: Real-Time Monitoring
items.description: Track safety metrics as they happen. Instant alerts keep your team informed before incidents escalate.

items.title: Custom Dashboards
items.description: Build intuitive dashboards tailored to your operation. Visualize KPIs that matter most to your team.

items.title: Protocol Compliance
items.description: Automate compliance checks and generate audit-ready reports with a single click.

items.title: Team Management
items.description: Assign roles, manage access, and coordinate your safety team from one central hub.

items.title: Incident Tracking
items.description: Log, categorize, and resolve incidents faster. Full history available for analysis and review.

items.title: Data-Driven Insights
items.description: Turn raw safety data into actionable insights that drive continuous improvement.

torch.headline: Analytics that illuminate every corner of your operation
torch.subheadline: Torch is the analytics engine inside BELT. Track, visualize, and optimize performance metrics in real time. Enable your teams to make confident, data-driven decisions through customizable dashboards and powerful insights.
torch.idealFor: Ideal for startups, tech companies, and growing businesses that want to harness the power of their data — built for teams looking to improve decision-making by tracking key performance indicators across all departments.

cta.headline: Ready to go beyond protocols?
cta.subheadline: Join the teams already using BELT to build safer, smarter factory environments.
